meanings.definition: The bony prominence of the elbow, on the upper end of the ulna.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally hit his olecranons on the table, causing a sharp pain.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined his olecranons to check for any signs of injury.
meanings.sent3: When he tried to dance, his olecranons kept knocking into things comically.
meanings.sent4: Her olecranons felt like two small rocks jutting out from her arms.
meanings.sent5: The olecranons are like protective shields for the delicate joint underneath.
